raw_text: PANAMBALANA LEONARD – (Retired Secretary – Ministry of Health). Cherished and treasured husband of Quinzie,​ precious Thaththa & Appachchi of Malkanthi & Lal,​ Chandi & Primal,​ Dushi & Manilal and adored Aththa & Thaththa of Cisholi,​ Chehani,​ Ashanya,​ Janek,​ Maneka,​ Dineeka,​ Mithraka & Dhruvik,​ beloved son of the late Sylvester & Josephine Panamlabalana,​ loved brother of late Harry,​ late Kingsley,​ Pauline,​ Alan & late Christo,​ loved uncle of Robert & Mohan,​ passedaway peacefully. Remains lie at 51,​ Asoka Circle,​ Subuthipura,​ Battaramulla from 4.00 p.m. Friday,​ 4th August 2023. Cortege leaves at 3.45 p.m. on Saturday,​ 5 August 2023 for Cremation at the General Cemetery Kanatte (New Crematorium) at 4.30 p.m.048116

SHAKTHEVELL – T. (Ex HNB). It is with heavy hearts & profound sadness that we announce the passing away of T. SHAKTHEVELL (Ex HNB). Beloved husband of Manjula,​ loving father of Vaenthaan (UK),​ son of late Thambiayah & Rasaloginy,​ son-in-law of late S. Arulanantham,​ Paremeswary Arulanantham,​ loving brother of Sakthiyabama,​ Gnanamalar,​ Gnanavel. Funeral Sunday the 6th August at General Cemetery,​ Negombo. Cortege leaves residence,​ No. 68,​ Main Street,​ Negombo (Opposite General Post Office).048163

SUJATHA JAGODAGE – Wife of late Chandrasoma Ranaweera of Akuressa,​ mother of Samanthi,​ mother-in-law of Jayantha Wanniarachchi (Ex – RDA),​ loving grandmother of Ruwani (Software Engineer – CMS (Pvt) Ltd),​ passed away on 2nd August. Remains lie at Chandra Panagoda Funeral Parlour Malabe. Cortege leaves on 4th August for Interment at Talahena Cemetery at 5.00 p.m.048030
